name: Bali, Indonesia
description: Known for its titanic beaches and hundreds of Hindu shrines and temples, it’s no wonder Bali gets called the Island of the Gods. Each part of the island offers unique excursions. The southern section holds the most popular beaches, including surfer-friendly Balangan Beach.
location: Snorkeling, Monkey Forest Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

name: Chiang Mai, Thailand
description: Chiang May is the largest city in northern Thailand. It is the capital of Chiang Mai Province and was a former capital of the kingdom of Lan Na (1296–1768), which later became the Kingdom of Chiang Mai, a tributary state of Siam from 1774 to 1899, and finally the seat of princely rulers until 1939.
location: Street Food Tours, Hiking, Waterfall tour, Safari Tour, Mount Agung, Elephant tour, Nusa Dua Beach

name: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: Vietnam is an incredible country to visit, full of rich history, wonderful food and reasonable prices. Free-wheeling Ho Chi Minh City is typically the jumping off point for many travelers starting in the south and heading up through Hoi An, Hue, Hanoi or Ha Long Bay, or the grand finale city.
location: Ho Chi Minh City Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

name: Calgary, Canada
description: Visit Calgary for its cultural history, as well as its proximity to outdoor adventure spots in the Canadian Rocky Mountains.
location: Niagra Falls, Skylon Tower, Ripleys Aquarium, Ripley's Believe It Or Not, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

name: Tbilisi, Georgia
description: Travel to Tbilisi, an ancient crossroads between Asia and Europe, for a blend of medieval architecture and modern food and drink. MONEY named it No. 8 on this year’s Best in Travel ranking:
location: Snorkeling, Monkey Forest Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

name: Prague, Czech Republic
description: Immerse yourself in European culture and history on a budget in Prague. Entrance to many of the city’s cultural attractions — including the mid-10th century fort Vyšehrad, the city’s 1,000-year-old marketplace Old Town, and Holy Roman Emperor Charles IV’s namesake bridge — are free.
location: Snorkeling, Monkey Forest Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

name: San Diego, USA
description: San Diego's coastal seat makes it an ideal destination for adventurers and sun seekers. Whether you're hiking along the sandstone cliffs of Torrey Pines State Reserve, walking through the frothy surf of Coronado Beach or admiring the postcard-worthy scenery at La Jolla Cove, you'll find little reason to stray far from the city's natural wonders.
location: Snorkeling, Monkey Forest Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

name: British Virgin Islands
description: The British Virgin Islands, or BVI for short, are some of the most exclusive and least developed islands of the Caribbean, but this only adds to their appeal. The resorts, villas, restaurants and other tourist attractions in this paradise are known to emphasize spare luxury over sprawling expansion, and they attract travelers with deep pockets and a love for sailing and seclusion.
location: Snorkeling, Monkey Forest Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

name: Montego Bay, Jamaica
description: Relax and enjoy the beautiful white sandy beaches of Montego Bay, Jamaica. Plan your trip by discovering one-of-a-kind things to do, fantastic hotels, and more.
location: Snorkeling, Monkey Forest Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

name: Mérida, Mexico
description: Among the affordable Mexican vacation spots, Mérida comes out on top for both affordability and richness of experience. Average airfare is down 4.3% since 2016 according to Kayak, and a hotel costs about $74 on average on Hotels.com.
location: Snorkeling, Monkey Forest Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

name: Xi’an, China
description: Xi’an is one of the most affordable cities to visit in China right now. You can find good deals on flights for around $631 into Xi’an Xianyang International Airport according to Hopper, and hotels in the city are, on average, far cheaper than the $157-a-night spots found in Shanghai.
location: Snorkeling, Monkey Forest Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

name: Azores, Portugal
description: The Azores, a small archipelago of nine islands roughly 1,000 miles off the coast of Portugal, boasts scenic volcanic mountain peaks, year-round mild temperatures, and white, sandy beaches. The two islands most popular with travelers are São Miguel,the archipelago’s largest, and Santa Maria. On the former, you can visit water parks or surf or take a dip in the Termas da Ferraria thermal and ocean baths.
location: Snorkeling, Monkey Forest Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

description: Known for its titanic beaches and hundreds of Hindu shrines and temples, it’s no wonder Bali gets called the Island of the Gods. Each part of the island offers unique excursions. The southern section holds the most popular beaches, including surfer-friendly Balangan Beach.

name: Chiang Mai, Thailand
description: Chiang May is the largest city in northern Thailand. It is the capital of Chiang Mai Province and was a former capital of the kingdom of Lan Na (1296–1768), which later became the Kingdom of Chiang Mai, a tributary state of Siam from 1774 to 1899, and finally the seat of princely rulers until 1939.
location: Snorkeling, Monkey Forest Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

name: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: Vietnam is an incredible country to visit, full of rich history, wonderful food and reasonable prices. Free-wheeling Ho Chi Minh City is typically the jumping off point for many travelers starting in the south and heading up through Hoi An, Hue, Hanoi or Ha Long Bay, or the grand finale city if you’re doing it the other way around.
location: Snorkeling, Monkey Forest Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach

name: Calgary, Canada
description: Visit Calgary for its cultural history, as well as its proximity to outdoor adventure spots in the Canadian Rocky Mountains. The city’s sights include the 627-foot-tall Calgary Tower, which gives visitors a 360-degree view of the skyline, and the country’s largest living history museum, where you can learn how to trade fur like a 19th century colonial.
location: Snorkeling, Monkey Forest Tour, Ulun Danu Beratan, Waterfall tour, white water rafting, Mount Agung, Forest Sanctuary, Nusa Dua Beach
